edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.zeroKnowledge
Class ZKFromSigmaVerifier

java.lang.Object
  edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.zeroKnowledge.ZKFromSigmaVerifier
All Implemented Interfaces:
ZKVerifier
public class ZKFromSigmaVerifier
extends java.lang.Object
implements ZKVerifier

Concrete implementation of Zero Knowledge verifier.

This is a transformation that takes any Sigma protocol and any perfectly hiding commitment scheme and yields a zero-knowledge proof.

For more information see Protocol 6.5.1, page 161 of Hazay-Lindell.

The pseudo code of this protocol can be found in Protocol 2.1 of pseudo codes document at http://crypto.biu.ac.il/scapi/SDK_Pseudocode_SCAPI_V2.0.0.pdf.

Author:
Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)

Method Detail

verify

public boolean verify(ZKCommonInput input)
               throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                      java.io.IOException,
                      CheatAttemptException,
                      CommitValueException
Runs the verifier side of the Zero Knowledge proof.

Let (a,e,z) denote the prover1, verifier challenge and prover2 messages of the sigma protocol.

This function computes the following calculations:

SAMPLE a random challenge e <- {0, 1}^t

RUN COMMIT.commit as the committer with input e

WAIT for a message a from P

RUN COMMIT.decommit as the decommitter

WAIT for a message z from P

IF transcript (a, e, z) is accepting in sigma on input x

OUTPUT ACC

ELSE

OUTPUT REJ

Specified by:
verify in interface ZKVerifier
Parameters:
input - must be an instance of SigmaCommonInput.
Returns:
true if the proof was verified; false, otherwise.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given input is not an instance of SigmaCommonInput
CheatAttemptException - in case the verifier suspects the prover is trying to cheat.
java.io.IOException - in case there was a problem in the communication.
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - in case there was a problem in the serialization.
CommitValueException - can occur in case the commitment scheme is ElGamal.
